荋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ér］

荋字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　荋； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1031第01
【玉篇】【直音】?讓之切，音而。草多貌。　又草名。【馬融·廣成頌】芝荋菫荁。　又亭名。【說文】沛城有楊荋亭。又【集韻】汝來切，音腝。義同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　荋; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1031 01
[Jade articles] [Straight tone]? Let it cut, sound. The grass is beautiful.　Also cursive name. 【Ma Rong·Guangcheng Song】Zhizoma chinensis.　 Also named as a pavilion. [Said the text] There is Yang Lingting in Peicheng. Also [Jiyun] Nilai cut, sound syrup. The same meaning.
